/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and construction cranes, indicating a city in the throes of growth and development. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape.
